Symbol.Script_1D:
dim stOpeningLineStyle[2] stOpeningLineStyle[1] = `Handle` !Style 1 stOpeningLineStyle[2] = `Hinges` !Style 2
dim stOpeningLineType[5] stOpeningLineType[1] = `Solid Line` stOpeningLineType[2] = `Dashed` stOpeningLineType[3] = `Dotted` stOpeningLineType[4] = `Dash & Dotted` stOpeningLineType[5] = `None`
dim stSwingType[3] stSwingType[1] = `Curved` stSwingType[2] = `Straight` stSwingType[3] = `Simple Line`
dim stLineShapeSlidingType[3] stLineShapeSlidingType[1] = `None` stLineShapeSlidingType[2] = `Arrow` stLineShapeSlidingType[3] = `Simple Line`
! D_iSwingType: LINE_SHAPE_SWING_NONE = 0 LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED = 1 LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT = 2 LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE = 3
! D_iSlidingType: LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_NONE = 0 LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_ARROW = 1 LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_SIMPLE_LINE = 2
! iLSymbol PLANSYMB_REALISTIC = 1 PLANSYMB_ELECTRIC = 2 PLANSYMB_RCP = 3
Symbol.Script_UI:
totalWidth = 600 tabTop = 5 tabLeft = 5 tabRight = 5 rowDist = 25 column2PosX = totalWidth / 2
outfieldLength1 = totalWidth / 2 - tabLeft - tabRight outfieldLength2 = (totalWidth / 2 - tabLeft - tabRight) / 2 - 1
y0 = 5 x1 = tabLeft x2 = column2PosX + tabLeft dy = 29 dyradio = 24
_stDialogTitle = `Miscellaneous Settings for Library Parts (ArchiCAD Library 18)` if bEnableSecondaryOpLineTypes then ui_dialog _stDialogTitle, 600, 525 ui_separator totalWidth / 2, 0, totalWidth / 2, 524 else if bControlForSlidingDoor then if bEnableNEDFireRating then ui_dialog _stDialogTitle, 600, 510 + 60 ui_separator totalWidth / 2, 0, totalWidth / 2, 509 + 60 else ui_dialog _stDialogTitle, 600, 435 + 60 ui_separator totalWidth / 2, 0, totalWidth / 2, 434 + 60 endif else ui_dialog _stDialogTitle, 600, 410 + 60 ui_separator totalWidth / 2, 0, totalWidth / 2, 409 + 60 endif endif
! ============================================================================= ! Minimal space settings ! =============================================================================
y = y0 ui_infield{3} "showBMinSpace", x1, y-4, outfieldLength1, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `Show Minimal Space of Furnishings and Doors`, 0, 2, `Show Minimal Space of Furnishings and Doors`, 1
iFlag = 4 * not(showBMinSpace) !iFlag = 0 ! Prevent flashing
y = y + dy
if showBMinSpace then ui_pict 1, x1+40, y+2, 20, 20, 1 ! ui_contour_line.png else ui_pict 2, x1+40, y+2, 20, 20, 1 ! ui_contour_line_lock.png endif ui_infield "MSContLineType", x1+70, y-1, outfieldLength1 - 70, 26 ui_tooltip `Contour Line Type`
y = y + dy
if showBMinSpace then ui_pict 9, column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 80, y+2, 23, 17, 1 ! ui_pen.png else ui_pict 10, column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 80, y+2, 23, 17, 1 ! ui_pen_lock.png endif ui_infield "iMSContLinePen", column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 40, y, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Contour Line Pen` ui_infield "MSContLinePen", column2PosX - 35 - tabRight, y, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Contour Line Pen`
y = y + dy
if showBMinSpace then ui_pict 7, x1+40, y+2, 20, 20, 1 ! ui_fill_type.png else ui_pict 8, x1+40, y+2, 20, 20, 1 ! ui_fill_type_lock.png endif ui_infield "MSFillType", x1+70, y-1, outfieldLength1 - 70, 26 ui_tooltip `Fill Type`
y = y + dy
if showBMinSpace then ui_pict 5, column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 86, y+2, 29, 16, 1 ! ui_fill_pen.png else ui_pict 6, column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 86, y+2, 29, 16, 1 ! ui_fill_pen_lock.png endif ui_infield "iMSFillPen", column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 40, y, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Fill Pen` ui_infield "MSFillPen", column2PosX - 35 - tabRight, y, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Fill Pen`
y = y + dy
if showBMinSpace then ui_pict 3, column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 86, y+2, 29, 16, 1 ! ui_fill_bg_pen.png else ui_pict 4, column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 86, y+2, 29, 16, 1 ! ui_fill_bg_pen_lock.png endif ui_infield "iMSFillBackPen", column2PosX - 35 - tabRight - 40, y, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Background Pen` ui_infield "MSFillBackPen", column2PosX - 35 - tabRight, y, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Background Pen`
! ============================================================================= ! Lamps and lights override ! =============================================================================
y = y + dy ui_separator x1, y, column2PosX - tabRight, y y = y + dy / 3
ui_outfield `Lamps and HVAC Floor Plan Symbols`, x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18
y = y + dyradio
ui_radiobutton "iLSymbol", PLANSYMB_REALISTIC, `Realistic`, x1+20, y, 245, 20 y = y + dyradio
ui_radiobutton "iLSymbol", PLANSYMB_ELECTRIC, `Electric`, x1+20, y, 245, 20 y = y + dyradio
ui_radiobutton "iLSymbol",PLANSYMB_RCP, `Reflected Ceiling Plan`, x1+20, y, 245, 20
! ============================================================================= ! 3D accessories settings ! =============================================================================
dy1 = 23
y = y + dy ui_separator x1, y, column2PosX - tabRight, y y = y + dy / 3
ui_infield{3} "hideBKnobs", x1, y, outfieldLength1, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `Hide Furniture Knobs in 3D`, 0, 2, `Hide Furniture Knobs in 3D`, 1
y = y + dy1
ui_infield{3} "hideBTaps", x1, y, outfieldLength1, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `Hide Taps in 3D`, 0, 2, `Hide Taps in 3D`, 1
y = y + dy1
if bEnableWindowHandle then _stHandleHide = `Hide Door and Window Handles in 3D` else _stHandleHide = `Hide Door Handles and Knobs in 3D` endif
ui_infield{3} "hideBDoorHandles", x1, y, outfieldLength1, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, _stHandleHide, 0, 2, _stHandleHide, 1
isavailable = 0 isInArchiCAD = APPLICATION_QUERY ("MEPMODELER", "IsAvailable()", isavailable) isMEPEnabled = (isavailable OR isInArchiCAD = 0)
if isMEPEnabled then y = y + dy1 ui_separator x1, y, column2PosX - tabRight, y y = y + dy / 3
ui_infield{3} "showMEPConnect", x1, y, outfieldLength1, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `Show MEP Connections`, 0, 2, `Show MEP Connections`, 1 endif
if bEnableSecondaryOpLineTypes then gosub "DACH_DWUI" else gosub "INT_DWUI" endif
end
! ============================================================================= "INT_DWUI": ! ============================================================================= ! Door 2D swing settings ! =============================================================================
x1 = x2
y = y0 ui_outfield `Doors Opening Line in 2D Symbolic Display`, x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18 y = y + dy if bControlForSlidingDoor then ui_outfield `Line Shape - Doors`, x1, y, outfieldLength2, 18 ui_infield{3} "D_iSwingType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stSwingType[1], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, 2, stSwingType[2], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT, 3, stSwingType[3], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE
y = y + dy ui_outfield `Line Shape - Sliding Doors`, x1, y, outfieldLength2, 18 ui_infield{3} "D_iSlidingType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stLineShapeSlidingType[1], LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_NONE, 2, stLineShapeSlidingType[2], LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_ARROW, 3, stLineShapeSlidingType[3], LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_SIMPLE_LINE else ui_outfield `Line Shape`, x1+30, y, outfieldLength2 - 30, 18
ui_infield{3} "D_iSwingType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stSwingType[1], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, 2, stSwingType[2], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT endif y = y + dy
ui_pict 1, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 25, y+2, 20, 20, 1 ! ui_contour_line.png ui_infield "D_swingLineType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 26 ui_tooltip `Line Type`
y = y + dy
ui_pict 9, totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 80, y+2, 23, 17, 1 ! ui_pen.png ui_infield "D_iOpLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 40, y, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen` ui_infield "D_opLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight, y, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen`
y = y + dy ui_separator x1, y, totalWidth - tabRight, y y = y + dy / 3
! ============================================================================= ! Window 2D swing settings ! =============================================================================
! ui_outfield `Windows/Skylights Opening Line in 2D Symbolic Display`, x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18 ui_outfield `Windows/Skylights Opening Line`, x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18 y = y + 19 ui_outfield `in 2D Symbolic Display`, x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18
y = y + dy ui_outfield `Line Shape`, x1+30*not(bControlForSlidingDoor), y, outfieldLength2 - 30 * not(bControlForSlidingDoor), 18 UI_INFIELD{3} "W_iSwingType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stSwingType[1], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, 2, stSwingType[2], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT
y = y + dy
ui_pict 1, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 25, y+2, 20, 20, 1 ! ui_contour_line.png ui_infield "W_swingLineType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 26 ui_tooltip `Line Type`
y = y + dy
ui_pict 9, totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 80, y+2, 23, 17, 1 ! ui_pen.png ui_infield "W_iOpLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 40, y, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen` ui_infield "W_opLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight, y, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen`
y = y + dy ui_separator x2, y, 590, y y = y + dy / 3
! ============================================================================= ! Door 3D opening lines settings ! =============================================================================
ui_outfield `Show Opening Lines in 3D Projections`, x2, y, outfieldLength1, 18 y = y + 20 ui_infield{3} "D_showBOpLine3D", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y, outfieldLength2, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `on Doors`, 0, 2, `on Doors`, 1 y = y + dy
ui_infield{3} "W_showBOpLine3D", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y, outfieldLength2, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `on Windows`, 0, 2, `on Windows`, 1 y = y + dy
ui_infield{3} "S_showBOpLine3D", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y, outfieldLength2, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `on Skylights`, 0, 2, `on Skylights`, 1
iFlag = 4 * (not(D_showBOpLine3D) and not(W_showBOpLine3D) and not(S_showBOpLine3D))
y = y + dy ui_outfield `Line Type Opening Side`, x2, y, outfieldLength2, 15, iFlag ui_infield{3} "gs_opline_type_m", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-2, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stOpeningLineType[1], 1, 2, stOpeningLineType[2], 2, 3, stOpeningLineType[3], 3
y = y + dy ui_outfield `Line Type Opposite Side`, x2, y, outfieldLength2, 15, iFlag ui_infield{3} "gs_opline_type_m_out", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-2, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stOpeningLineType[1], 1, 2, stOpeningLineType[2], 2, 3, stOpeningLineType[3], 3
y = y + dy
if not(bHideOplineStyle) then ui_outfield `Line Orientation`, x2, y, outfieldLength2, 15, iFlag ui_infield{3} "gs_opline_style_m", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-2, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stOpeningLineStyle[1], 1, 2, stOpeningLineStyle[2], 2 y = y + dy endif
!! --- Disabled control --- see TT #108762 ----- !!ui_separator x2, y, 590, y !!y = y + dy/2 !! !!ui_infield{3} "bShowAddHotspots", x2, y, 300, 18, !! 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, !! 1, `Show Additional Hotspots for Doors/Windows`, 0, !! 2, `Show Additional Hotspots for Doors/Windows`, 1
!y = y + dy ! !ui_infield{3} "AC_bShowAddHotspotsForIS", x2, y, 300, 18, ! 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, ! 1, "Show IS Hotspots for Doors/Windows", 0, ! 2, "Show IS Hotspots for Doors/Windows", 1 !
! ============================================================================= ! NED Fire Rating ! ============================================================================= if bEnableNEDFireRating then ui_separator x2, y, 590, y y = y + dy / 3
ui_infield{3} "bShowFireRating", x2, y, 600-x2-10, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, `Show Fire Rating Symbol for Doors and Windows`, 0, 2, `Show Fire Rating Symbol for Doors and Windows`, 1
y = y + dy + 6
ui_pict 9, totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 80, y, 23, 17, 1 ! ui_pen.png ui_infield "iFireRatingSymbPen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 40, y, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Fire rating Symbol Pen` ui_infield "fireRatingSymbPen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight, y, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Fire rating Symbol Pen` endif
end
return
! ============================================================================= "DACH_DWUI": ! =============================================================================
dy1 = dy - 6 dy2 = dy - 1
x1 = x2
y = y0 ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Opening Lines in 2D Symbolic Display`, x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18 ui_style 0, 0
y = y + dy1 - 4
ui_infield{3} "D_showBOpLine2D", x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18, 7, "", 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", `Show for Doors`, 0, "", `Show for Doors`, 1
y = y + dy1
ui_outfield `Line Shape`, x1+16, y, outfieldLength2 - 16, 18, 4-4*D_showBOpLine2D ui_infield{3} "D_iSwingType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stSwingType[1], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, 2, stSwingType[2], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT
y = y + dy2
ui_outfield `Main Leaf`, x1+16, y, outfieldLength2 - 16 - 22, 18, 4-4*D_showBOpLine2D if D_showBOpLine2D then ui_pict 11, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 else ui_pict 12, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 endif ui_infield "D_swingLineType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-6, outfieldLength2, 26 ui_tooltip `Line Type`
y = y + dy2
ui_outfield `Secondary Leaf`, x1+16, y, outfieldLength2 - 16 - 22, 18, 4-4*D_showBOpLine2D if D_showBOpLine2D then ui_pict 13, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 else ui_pict 14, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 endif ui_infield "D_swingLineType2", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-6, outfieldLength2, 26 ui_tooltip `Line Type`
y = y + dy1
ui_infield{3} "W_showBOpLine2D", x1, y, outfieldLength1, 18, 7, "", 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", `Show for Windows`, 0, "", `Show for Windows`, 1
y = y + dy1
ui_outfield `Line Shape`, x1+16, y, outfieldLength2 - 16, 18, 4-4*W_showBOpLine2D ui_infield{3} "W_iSwingType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-1, outfieldLength2, 20, 8, "", 2, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stSwingType[1], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, 2, stSwingType[2], LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT
y = y + dy2
ui_outfield `Main Sash`, x1+16, y, outfieldLength2 - 16 - 22, 18, 4-4*W_showBOpLine2D if W_showBOpLine2D then ui_pict 11, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 else ui_pict 12, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 endif ui_infield "W_swingLineType", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-6, outfieldLength2, 26
y = y + dy2
ui_outfield `Secondary Sash`, x1+16, y, outfieldLength2 - 16 - 22, 18, 4-4*W_showBOpLine2D if W_showBOpLine2D then ui_pict 13, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 else ui_pict 14, x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2 - 22, y-3, 20, 20, 1 endif ui_infield "W_swingLineType2", x1 + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-6, outfieldLength2, 26
y = y + dy1 - 1
ui_separator x1, y, 595, y y = y + dy / 3
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Opening Lines in 3D Projections`, x2, y, outfieldLength1, 18 ui_style 0, 0
y = y + dy1 - 4
ui_infield{3} "D_showBOpLine3D", x2, y, outfieldLength2, 18, 7, "", 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", `Show for Doors`, 0, "", `Show for Doors`, 1
ui_infield{3} "S_showBOpLine3D", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y, outfieldLength2, 18, 7, "", 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", `Show for Skylights`, 0, "", `Show for Skylights`, 1
y = y + dy1
ui_infield{3} "W_showBOpLine3D", x2, y, outfieldLength2, 18, 7, "", 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", `Show for Windows`, 0, "", `Show for Windows`, 1
y = y + dy1
iFlag = 4 * (not(D_showBOpLine3D) and not(W_showBOpLine3D) and not(S_showBOpLine3D)) iFlagD = 4 * (not(D_showBOpLine3D)) iFlagW = 4 * (not(W_showBOpLine3D))
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Main Door Leaves and Window Sashes`, x2, y, outfieldLength1, 18 ui_style 0, 0
y = y + dy1
ui_outfield `Opening Side`, column2PosX + tabLeft, y, outfieldLength2, 15, iFlag ui_infield{3} "gs_opline_type_m", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-2, outfieldLength2, 18, 8, "", 4, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stOpeningLineType[1], 1, 2, stOpeningLineType[2], 2, 3, stOpeningLineType[3], 3, 4, stOpeningLineType[4], 4
y = y + dy1
ui_outfield `Opposite Side`, x2, y, outfieldLength2, 15, iFlag ui_infield{3} "gs_opline_type_m_out", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-2, outfieldLength2, 18, 8, "", 4, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stOpeningLineType[1], 1, 2, stOpeningLineType[2], 2, 3, stOpeningLineType[3], 3, 4, stOpeningLineType[4], 4
y = y + dy1
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Door Secondary Leaves`, x2, y, outfieldLength1, 18 ui_style 0, 0
y = y + dy1
ui_outfield `Both Sides`, x2, y, outfieldLength2, 15, iFlagD ui_infield{3} "D_iOpLineType2", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-2, outfieldLength2, 18, 8, "", 5, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stOpeningLineType[1], 1, 2, stOpeningLineType[2], 2, 3, stOpeningLineType[3], 3, 4, stOpeningLineType[4], 4, 5, stOpeningLineType[5], 5
y = y + dy1
ui_style 0, 1 ui_outfield `Window Secondary Sash`, x2, y, outfieldLength1, 18 ui_style 0, 0
y = y + dy1
ui_outfield `Both Sides`, x2, y, outfieldLength2, 15, iFlagW ui_infield{3} "W_iOpLineType2", column2PosX + tabLeft + outfieldLength2 + 2, y-2, outfieldLength2, 18, 8, "", 5, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stOpeningLineType[1], 1, 2, stOpeningLineType[2], 2, 3, stOpeningLineType[3], 3, 4, stOpeningLineType[4], 4, 5, stOpeningLineType[5], 5
y = y + dy1 - 1
y = y + 7
ui_outfield `Opening Line Pen for Doors`, x1, y, 185, 15, iFlag ui_pict 9, totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 65, y, 23, 17, 1 ! ui_pen.png ui_infield "D_iOpLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 35, y-3, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen` ui_infield "D_opLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight, y-3, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen`
y = y + dy1
ui_outfield `Opening Line Pen for Windows`, x1, y, 185, 15, iFlag !! ui_outfield y, x1, y, 140, 15, iFlag ui_pict 9, totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 65, y, 23, 17, 1 ! ui_pen.png ui_infield "W_iOpLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight - 35, y-3, 30, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen` ui_infield "W_opLinePen", totalWidth - 35 - tabRight, y-3, 35, 20 ui_tooltip `Opening Line and Swing Pen`
return
Symbol.Script_VL:
![#COMPATIBILITY] - START if W_iSwingType = -1 | D_iSwingType = -1 then W_showBOpLine3D = showBOpLine3D W_iSwingType = gs_iSwingType W_swingLineType = gs_swingLineType W_opLinePen = gs_opLinePen W_iOpLinePen = iOplinePen parameters W_showBOpLine3D = showBOpLine3D, W_iSwingType = gs_iSwingType, W_swingLineType = gs_swingLineType, W_opLinePen = gs_opLinePen, W_iOpLinePen = iOplinePen
D_showBOpLine3D = showBOpLine3D D_iSwingType = gs_iSwingType D_swingLineType = gs_swingLineType D_opLinePen = gs_opLinePen D_iOpLinePen = iOplinePen parameters D_showBOpLine3D = showBOpLine3D, D_iSwingType = gs_iSwingType, D_swingLineType = gs_swingLineType, D_opLinePen = gs_opLinePen, D_iOpLinePen = iOplinePen else showBOpLine3D = D_showBOpLine3D gs_iSwingType = D_iSwingType gs_swingLineType= D_swingLineType gs_opLinePen = D_opLinePen iOpLinePen = D_iOplinePen parameters showBOpLine3D = showBOpLine3D, gs_iSwingType = gs_iSwingType, gs_swingLineType = gs_swingLineType, gs_opLinePen = gs_opLinePen, iOpLinePen = iOpLinePen endif
if not(bInitialized_S_showBOpLine3D) & GLOB_CONTEXT <> 1 then S_showBOpLine3D = showBOpLine3D parameters S_showBOpLine3D = showBOpLine3D, bInitialized_S_showBOpLine3D = 1 endif
parameters bShowAddHotspots = 1
![#COMPATIBILITY] - END
values "gs_opline_type_m" 1, 2, 3, 4 values "gs_opline_type_m_out" 1, 2, 3, 4
values "D_iOpLineType2" 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 values "W_iOpLineType2" 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
values "gs_opline_style_m" 1, 2
values "gs_iSwingType" LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT
values "W_iSwingType" LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT
if bEnableSimpleLine then values "D_iSwingType" LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT, LINE_SHAPE_SWING_SIMPLE_LINE
values "D_iSlidingType" LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_NONE , LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_ARROW, LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_SIMPLE_LINE else values "D_iSwingType" LINE_SHAPE_SWING_CURVED, LINE_SHAPE_SWING_STRAIGHT
values "D_iSlidingType" LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_NONE , LINE_SHAPE_SLIDING_ARROW endif
values "iLSymbol" 1, 2, 3
if not(W_showBOpLine3D) and not(D_showBOpLine3D) and not(S_showBOpLine3D) then lock "gs_opline_type_m_out", "gs_opline_type_m", "gs_opline_style_m" endif
if not(showBMinSpace) then lock "MSFillType", "MSFillPen", "MSFillBackPen", "MSContLineType", "MSContLinePen", "iMSFillPen", "iMSFillBackPen", "iMSContLinePen" endif
if not(W_showBOpLine3D) then lock "W_iOpLineType2" endif
if not(D_showBOpLine3D) then lock "D_iOpLineType2" endif
!old Ceiling plan/Floor plan option merged and controlled by the new MVO
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iLSymbol" then original_AC_Ceiling_Plan = AC_Ceiling_Plan if iLSymbol = 3 then AC_Ceiling_Plan = 1 else AC_Ceiling_Plan = 0 endif if AC_Ceiling_Plan <> original_AC_Ceiling_Plan then parameters AC_Ceiling_Plan = AC_Ceiling_Plan endif else original_iLSymbol = ilSymbol if AC_Ceiling_Plan = 1 and iLSymbol <> 3 then iLSymbol = 3 endif if AC_Ceiling_Plan = 0 and iLSymbol = 3 then iLSymbol = 1 endif if original_iLSymbol <> iLSymbol then parameters iLSymbol = iLSymbol endif endif
! --- Connecting integer and pencolor type parameters ---
for i = 1 to 255 put i next i
values "gs_opLinePen" use(NSP) values "W_opLinePen" use(NSP) values "D_opLinePen" use(NSP)
values "fireRatingSymbPen" use(NSP)
values "MSContLinePen" use(NSP) values "MSFillPen" get(NSP)
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iMSFillBackPen" then if iMSFillBackPen < -1 | iMSFillBackPen > 255 then iMSFillBackPen = 1 parameters iMSFillBackPen = iMSFillBackPen endif parameters MSFillBackPen = iMSFillBackPen else parameters iMSFillBackPen = MSFillBackPen endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iMSContLinePen" then if iMSContLinePen < 1 | iMSContLinePen > 255 then iMSContLinePen = 1 parameters iMSContLinePen = iMSContLinePen endif parameters MSContLinePen= iMSContLinePen else parameters iMSContLinePen= MSContLinePen endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iMSFillPen" then if iMSFillPen < 1 | iMSFillPen > 255 then iMSFillPen = 1 parameters iMSFillPen = iMSFillPen endif parameters MSFillPen= iMSFillPen else parameters iMSFillPen= MSFillPen endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iOplinePen" then if iOplinePen < 1 | iOplinePen > 255 then iOplinePen = 1 parameters iOplinePen = iOplinePen endif parameters gs_opLinePen = iOplinePen else parameters iOplinePen = gs_opLinePen endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "W_iOpLinePen" then if W_iOpLinePen < 1 | W_iOplinePen > 255 then W_iOpLinePen = 1 parameters W_iOpLinePen = W_iOpLinePen endif parameters W_opLinePen = W_iOpLinePen else parameters W_iOpLinePen = W_opLinePen endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "D_iOpLinePen" then if D_iOpLinePen < 1 | D_iOpLinePen > 255 then D_iOpLinePen = 1 parameters D_iOpLinePen = D_iOpLinePen endif parameters D_opLinePen = D_iOpLinePen else parameters D_iOpLinePen = D_opLinePen endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "iFireRatingSymbPen" then if iFireRatingSymbPen < 1 | iFireRatingSymbPen > 255 then iFireRatingSymbPen = 1 parameters iFireRatingSymbPen = iFireRatingSymbPen endif parameters fireRatingSymbPen = iFireRatingSymbPen else parameters iFireRatingSymbPen = fireRatingSymbPen endif
!DACH UI lock if bEnableSecondaryOpLineTypes then if not(D_showBOpLine2D) then lock "D_iSwingType", "D_swingLineType", "D_swingLineType2" endif if not(W_showBOpLine2D) then lock "W_iSwingType", "W_swingLineType", "W_swingLineType2" endif endif
